constituent: compensation, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, muzzle, vase, stand up, mouth
heisigStory: Picture a clam used as a muzzle to quiet the complaints of a fisherman's widow asking compensation for her husband lost at sea.
koohiiStory1: Compensation is money you give to someone to shut them up (i.e. muzzle their mouth).
koohiiStory2: Compensation is a kind of euphemism for hush money here. Money that muzzles.
myStory: lương thưởng. vỏ sò trả công đứng nói
